header: The Genealogy From Adam to Israel[a]From Adam to Noah

verse: Adam, Seth, Enosh,
Kenan, Mahalalel, Jared,
Enoch, Methuselah, Lamech,
Noah.
The sons of Japheth were Gomer, Magog, Madai, Javan, Tubal, Meshek, and Tiras.
The sons of Gomer were Ashkenaz, Diphath, and Togarmah.
The sons of Javan were Elishah, Tarshish, the Kittim, and the Rodanim.
The sons of Ham were Cush, Mizraim, Put, and Canaan.
The sons of Cush were Seba, Havilah, Sabta, Ra’ama, and Sabteca.
Cush became the father of Nimrod. Nimrod was the first to be a mighty warrior on the earth.
Mizraim became the father of the Ludim, the Anamim, the Lehabim, the Naphtuhim,
the Pathrusim, the Casluhim (from whom the Philistines came), and the Caphtorim.
Canaan became the father of Sidon, his firstborn, and of Heth,
also of the Jebusites, the Amorites, the Girgashites,
the Hivites, the Arkites, the Sinites,
the Arvadites, the Zemarites, and the Hamathites.
Shem, Arphaxad, Shelah,
Eber, Peleg, Reu,
Serug, Nahor, Terah,
Abram (also called Abraham).
The sons of Abraham were Isaac and Ishmael.
These are their genealogies:
Mishma, Dumah, Massa, Hadad, Tema,
Jetur, Naphish, and Kedemah. These are the sons of Ishmael.
These are the sons of Keturah, Abraham’s concubine. She gave birth to Zimran, Jokshan, Medan, Midian, Ishbak, and Shuah.
The sons of Midian were Ephah, Epher, Hanok, Abida, and Elda’ah.
Abraham became the father of Isaac.
The sons of Esau were Eliphaz, Reuel, Jeush, Jalam, and Korah.
The sons of Eliphaz were Teman, Omar, Zephi, Gatam, Kenaz, and Amalek by Timna.
The sons of Reuel were Nahath, Zerah, Shammah, and Mizzah.

header: The People of Seir in Edom

verse: These are the kings who reigned in the land of Edom before any king reigned over the people of Israel:
Chief Oholibamah, Chief Elah, Chief Pinon,
Chief Kenaz, Chief Teman, Chief Mibzar,
Chief Magdiel, and Chief Iram. These are the chiefs of Edom.
